subject: Tennis
Sports Injuries
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams, the No. 1 women’s player, will miss three tournaments in the buildup to the United States Open because of surgery on her right foot, the WTA said.
snippet: Serena Williams, the No. 1 women’s player, will miss three tournaments in the buildup to the United States Open because of surgery on her right foot, the WTA said.
